result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marques Javontae Holt not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Jude appeared by video for Marques Javontae Holt.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Final Pretrial held.  Parties remain in trial posture.  Any further motions will be heard on day of trial.  Case remains calendared for SPEEDY Jury Trial on 11/9/2022 at 9:00am, Courthouse Room 501.
Received and Filed. State's Motion in Limine
Received and Filed. State's Witness List
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Marques J. Holt, House of Correction - K6/Bed 7, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Dismissal.  (Marques J. Holt, House of Correction - K6/Bed 7, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.  Expires 11/28/2022.

Defendant Marques Javontae Holt not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Jude in court for Marques Javontae Holt.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Case called at Court's request.  Court incorrectly scheduled jury trial dates.  Demand for Speedy Trial expires 11/28/2022.  Court vacates previously scheduled court dates.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Marques Javontae Holt not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Jude in court for Marques Javontae Holt.  Prosecuting attorney Elaine B. Fehrs appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and SPEEDY jury trial date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Status conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Speedy Trial.  (Marques J. Holt - #2022007371, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Marques Javontae Holt not in court, defendant in custody.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Public defenders office has not appointed counsel on this case.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.  Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marques Javontae Holt not in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case heard off the record due to court reporter availability.
State informed the Court that this case should be reassigned to DV Court. Given the date of intake, this case will be reassigned to Branch 35.
Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 35.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with RLB;  MJT
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Marques Javontae Holt in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Defendant Marques Javontae Holt in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marques Javontae Holt appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
